resources.string: Hello, my name is Chary Nepesov, and I teach programming. \n\nMy mission is to help 1 Million students reach their goal of becoming the best I want to make you, a well-rounded developer. I have extensive experience in Mobile App Development and Web I am also the founder of Build Apps With Chary, where students are well-rounded developers - developers who have soft and technical skills. Showing students how to make amazing applications/software is a gratifying experience. That\'s why I have been teaching online for the past 5 years. My goal is to make you a great developer, no matter your experience. I enjoy spending time with my family. Thank you so much for being here.
